This dataset is a subset of the Global RIver-lanD (GRID) Database and includes surface water quality data from 226 USGS river monitoring sites across the U.S. [Click this link](https://doi.org/10.1016/j.scitotenv.2023.164138){target="_blank"} to access the corresponding peer-reviewed article that interprets the dataset. In addition, the dataset can be downloaded via this [data DOI](https://doi.org/10.5281/zenodo.7937820){target="_blank"}.
